author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Remove the unexcercised code inlined
into the svn_rangelist_remove() function which is already handled
(earlier in the routine) by the range_contains() test and its
elt1->end == elt2->end)" test and associated block of code.

author: cmpilato
msg: Make svn2rss.py actually pay attention to its --svn-path option.
(SVN2RSS.__init__): Stop hanging onto svn_path, but do store a new
svnlook, and use the list input form of popen2.popen3().
(main): Calculate the path to svnlook based on the (optional)
--svn-path option.  Use the list input form of popen2.popen3().

author: cmpilato
msg: (main): Reduce the try/except for -r option parsing to the smallest

author: cmpilato
msg: (main): New, now containing all the stuff that was in the global
scope previously.  Call it a bad habit, but I don't like seeing
real work done in the global scope of a Python script.
